column3: was the second child of Húrin and Morwen

column1: Urwen was a happy child and her parents gave her the epessë "Laughter" (Lalaith)
column3: Nen Lalaith. She was three years old when she died of a plague sent out from Angband. Her death was especially hard on her older brother Túrin.

column1: Lalaith comes from the Sindarin word Lalaith (word)
Category:Characters in The Children of Húrin
